title: Who is the braindead employee who decided 4/5 can surrender the game
body: I'd like to know who the pathetic braindead is that decided to make it so that you only need 4 people out of 5 to surrender the game. This person deserves a swift execution.

replies.body: How is 4/5 unreasonable? It's a vast majority vote. Making it 5/5 would make it far too easy for one salty/tilted/negative player to deny a surrender vote and keep trolling. The risks of a 5/5 vote far outweigh the benefits.

So what you're saying is that you, as an individual, are more important than *four* other players?

Get over yourself.
